pages.text: He said: my son, do not tell your dream to your brothers, so they don't plan a plot against you, indeed Satan is human being’s obvious enemy

And that is how your Master chooses you and teaches you the interpretation of events (and dreams) and completes His favor on you and the Jacob’s family as He previously completed it on your fathers Abraham and Isaac. Indeed your Master is knowledgeable and wise
In (the story of) Joseph and his brothers there are definitely signs for those who ask
(Remember) when they said: Joseph and his brother (Benjamin) are more loved by our father than us, although we are a bunch, our father is certainly in an obvious mistake
Kill Joseph or throw him out to another land, then your father’s full attention will be yours, and you will be righteous people after that
A speaker among them said: do not kill Joseph, but throw him down in the bottom of the well so some caravan picks him up if you are doers
They said: our father, why do you not trust us with Joseph while we really wish him well
Send him with us tomorrow to enjoy and play and we are certainly his guardians
He said: indeed it saddens me if you take him away, and I am afraid that a wolf eats him while you are unaware of him
They said: if a wolf eats him while we are a bunch, then indeed we are losers
